title: [Dynamic Regions] tikv panic after injection network loss for one of tikv repeatedly

### Steps to reproduce
1、run workload
sysbench --db-driver=mysql --time=0 --mysql-db=test --mysql-host=tc-tidb.ha-test-tikv-network-fault-rpt-tps-2850172-1-727 --mysql-port=4000 --threads=64 --tables=32 --table-size=10000000 --mysql-ignore-errors=\"2013,1213,1105,1205,8022,8027,8028,9001,9004,9007,1062\
2、injection network loss for one of tikv repeatedly
["Run chaos"] [name=network-loss] 

### What did you expect?
no panic

### What did happened?
tikv panic after injection network loss for one of tikv repeatedly
